name: Wheelie Legend
description:
Like Grampa used to say, "if you are bored of wheeling your dirt bike you are bored of life"

Touch the screen to pop a wheelie, keep the balance as long as you can over bumps and jumps.

Easy to learn but hard to master, deep down inside everyone is a wheelie legend.

Download today, become the legend.

Game @colburt187
Art @folmerkelly
Music http://niksudan.com
